mapper.select: select M.ORI_CD oriCd, M.SCT_ID sctId, M.MAP_VER mapVer, M.MAP_STAT_CD mapStatCd, M.RV_STAT_CD rvStatCd, M.DISP_ODR dispOdr, M.UDT_DT udtDt, S.SCT_TERM sctTerm , CD.CD_DSCRT mapStatNm, (select GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(MA.ATT_SCT_ID,'|',A.SCT_TERM,' |= ', MA.VAL_SCT_ID,'|',V.SCT_TERM) SEPARATOR ' , ' ) from EMR.MAP_KCD_SCT_AFT_CAT MA inner join EMR.CM_SNOMEDCT A on MA.ATT_SCT_ID=A.SCT_ID inner join EMR.CM_SNOMEDCT V on MA.VAL_SCT_ID=V.SCT_ID where M.ORI_TP_CD=MA.ORI_TP_CD and M.MAP_VER=MA.MAP_VER and M.ORI_CD=MA.ORI_CD and M.SCT_ID=MA.SCT_ID ) afterMap from EMR.MAP_KCD_SCT M left outer join EMR.CM_SNOMEDCT S ON M.SCT_ID=S.SCT_ID left outer join EMR.MCODE CD ON left(M.MAP_STAT_CD,1)=CD.CD_ID AND CD.CD_GRP='MAP_STAT_CD' AND CD.CD_STAT_CD='0' where M.ORI_CD = #{value}
mapper.delete: DELETE from MAP_KCD_SCT where ORI_CD = #{oriCd} and SCT_ID = #{sctId};
DELETE FROM MAP_KCD_SCT2 WHERE ORI_CD = #{oriCd} AND SCT_ID = #{sctId};
